data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Noort, Simon van, Buffington, Matthew L. (2013): Revision of the Afrotropical Mayrellinae (Cynipoidea, Liopteridae), with the first record of Paramblynotus from Madagascar. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 31: 1-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.31.4072, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.31.4072
